name: StarGuy - Early Access
description:
In this top-down space shooter, you take control of a powerful spaceship, player will be named Guy, as you navigate through intense levels filled with waves of enemy spacecraft. Dodge a rain of bullets while blasting away your foes with various abilities and power-ups. With fast-paced gameplay and challenging bosses, this bullet hell game will put your skills to the test as you fight to save the galaxy from the invading alien forces. Are you ready to pilot Guy to victory?

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W A S D -  Move

LMB       -  Attack

Space    -  Dash
